cpsbadges.title: Chicago Public Schools Sports Badges
cpsbadges.description: Created a custom web application for awarding and viewing custom digital sports awards and certificates, using agile methodology. See the presentation here.

fileaccessradio.title: Remote File Access Over Radio
fileaccessradio.description: Created a program to access files on a remote (but within range) device over radio, using Node.js, MicroBit, and Serial Communication.

knowe.title: Knowe: Loan Tracking Application
knowe.description: An Android Application for keeping track of loans.

mcyaf.title: MCYAF Site Renovation
mcyaf.description: Volunteer with the Maine Community Youth Assistance Foundation to create a new content management system website and to train them on data entry and maintenance.

facedetection.title: Facial Detection App
facedetection.description: A full-stack web application that makes use of Clarifai's facial detection API deployed onto Heroku.

advanced-minecraft.title: Advanced Minecraft Mods
advanced-minecraft.description: Minecraft Mods made to work on CodeKingdom's platform for Minecraft, used to teach object-oriented programming to K-12 students.

alien-ruins.title: Alien Ruins
alien-ruins.description: Created the UI and sprites for a variant of ruinscape that involves uncovering ancient alien structures
